articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The suspect is a 50-year-old man from Saudi Arabia who has lived in Germany for almost two decades.
articles.title: Suspect in German Christmas market attack held on murder charges

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Six people were killed and others injured in an Israeli strike on a school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, the civil emergency service reported on Sunday.
articles.title: Six killed in Israeli strike on school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, civil emergency says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ahmed al-Sharaa said no sects would be excluded.
articles.title: Syria's de facto ruler reassures minorities, meets Lebanese Druze leader

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Tens of thousands of people gathered in central Belgrade on Sunday to protest against President Aleksandar Vucic and his ruling Serbian Progressive Party (SNS), whom they blame for a railway station roof collapse last month that killed 15 people.
articles.title: Tens of thousands gather in anti-government protest in Belgrade

articles.author: Gram Slattery
articles.description: Trump's Truth Social post was an exceedingly rare example of a U.S. leader saying he could push a sovereign country to hand over territory.
articles.title: Trump says he might demand Panama hand over canal

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A small plane with 10 people aboard crashed into shops in the center of the tourist city of Gramado in southern Brazil on Sunday, civil defense officials said, and initial reports indicated that there were no survivors.
articles.title: Small plane crashes into Brazilian tourist city, killing at least 10

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Four people were killed in southwest Turkey on Sunday when an ambulance helicopter collided with a hospital building and crashed into the ground.
articles.title: Four killed in helicopter crash at Turkish hospital

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine's security service has named a Russian general it suspects of ordering a missile strike on a hotel in eastern Ukraine in August and said he acted "with the motive of deliberately killing employees of" Reuters.
articles.title: Ukraine says Russian general deliberately targeted Reuters staff in August missile strike

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China said on Sunday it was taking countermeasures against two Canadian institutions and 20 people involved in human issues concerning the Uyghurs and Tibet.
articles.title: China takes steps against Canada institutions, individuals over Uyghurs, Tibet

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Mozambique's death toll from Cyclone Chido has risen to 94, news agency AFP said on Sunday, citing the country's disaster management agency.
articles.title: Mozambique's death toll from Cyclone Chido rises to 94, AFP reports
